entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Severn
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:12 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -32.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Severn Airport 08:10 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -32.4°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -44
Dewpoint: -35.6°C
Wind: NW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 47 this morning and minus 42 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:51 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 45 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 06:51 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 27.
